div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 188 Euboea, c. 1900 Burial: 250-200 B.C. (Picard) Contents: 21 AR Euboean League: 1 didr.; 4 tetradr.; 2 dr. Carystus: 4 didr. (cock) 1 didr. (male head) 1 triob. Chalcis: 2 dr. Eretria: 1 tetradr. Histiaea: 1 dr.; 3 tetrob. Disposition: private coll., Athens To be published by O. Picard
